Subscribed to document notifications: Suscrito a las notificaciones de los documentos
Unsubscribed from document notifications: Cancelado de las notificaciones de los documentos
Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: Deleting the {{collectionName}} collection is permanent and cannot be restored, however documents within will be moved to the trash.

Template created, go ahead and customize: Plantilla creada, sigue adelante y personalízala
Creating a template from <em>{{titleWith: Crear una plantilla a partir de {{titleWithDefault}} es una acción no destructiva: haremos una copia del documento y la convertiremos en una plantilla que se puede utilizar como punto de partida para nuevos documentos.
Module failed to load: El módulo no ha podido ser cargado
Sorry, part of the application failed to: Lo sentimos, parte de la aplicación no se ha podido cargar. Esto puede deberse a que se actualizó desde que abriste la pestaña o debido a una solicitud de red fallida. Por favor, intenta volver a cargarla.
Sorry, an unrecoverable error occurred{{: Lo sentimos, se ha producido un error irrecuperable{{notified}}. Intenta volver a cargar la página, puede haber sido un error temporal.
Exporting the collection <em>{{collectio: La exportación de la colección {{collectionName}} puede tardar algún tiempo.
You will receive an email when it's comp: You will receive an email when it's complete.
A ZIP file containing the images, and do: A ZIP file containing the images, and documents in the Markdown format.

Collections are for grouping your docume: Las colecciones sirven para agrupar tus documentos. Funcionan mejor cuando se organizan en torno a un tema o un equipo interno: Producto o Ingeniería, por ejemplo.

The <em>{{ collectionName }}</em> collec: La colección {{ collectionName }} es privada. Los miembros del espacio de trabajo no tienen acceso a él de forma predeterminada.
Workspace members can view and edit docu: Los miembros del espacio de trabajo pueden ver y editar documentos en la colección {{ collectionName }} de forma predeterminada.
Workspace members can view documents in: Workspace members can view documents in the {{ collectionName }} collection by default.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: Cuando está habilitado, los documentos se pueden compartir públicamente en Internet.
Public sharing is currently disabled in: Compartir públicamente está desactivado en las configuraciones de seguridad del equipo.

Are you sure you want to delete the <em>: ¿Está seguro de que desea eliminar la plantilla {{ documentTitle }}?

Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{ documentTitle }} document will delete all of its history and one nested document.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the {{ documentTitle }} document will delete all of its history and {{ any }} nested documents.

Are you sure you want to permanently del: ¿Estás seguro de que desea eliminar de forma permanente el documento {{ documentTitle }}? Esta acción es inmediata y no se puede deshacer.
Heads up – moving the document <em>{{ ti: Heads up – moving the document {{ title }} to the {{ newCollectionName }} collection will grant all members of the workspace {{ newPermission }}, they currently have {{ prevPermission }}.

No tienes borradores en este momento.

A team admin (<em>{{ suspendedContactEma: Un administrador de equipo ({{ suspendedContactEmail }}) ha suspendido tu cuenta. Para reactivar su cuenta, comuníquese con ellos directamente.
Are you sure about that? Deleting the <e: ¿Estás seguro de eso? Eliminar el grupo {{groupName}} hará que sus miembros pierdan el acceso a las colecciones y documentos con los que está asociado.
You can edit the name of this group at a: Puedes editar el nombre de este grupo en cualquier momento, sin embargo, hacerlo con demasiada frecuencia podría confundir a tus compañeros de equipo.
Add members below to give them access to: Add members below to give them access to the group. Need to add someone who’s not yet a member?
Add and remove members to the <em>{{grou: Añadir y eliminar miembros al grupo {{groupName}}. Los miembros del grupo tendrán acceso a cualquier colección a la que este grupo haya sido añadido.
Groups are for organizing your team. The: Los grupos son para organizar tu equipo. Funcionan mejor cuando se centran en una función o una responsabilidad: soporte o ingeniería, por ejemplo.
You’ll be able to add people to the grou: A continuación, podrás añadir personas al grupo.
Weird, this shouldn’t ever be empty: Que raro, esto nunca debería estar vacío

Sorry, you can only send {{MAX_INVITES}}: Lo sentimos, solo puedes enviar {{MAX_INVITES}} invitaciones a la vez
Invite members or guests to join your wo: Invite members or guests to join your workspace. They can sign in with {{signinMethods}} or use their email address.
Invite members to join your workspace. T: Invite members to join your workspace. They will need to sign in with {{signinMethods}}.
As an admin you can also <2>enable email: Como administrador, también puedes <2> habilitar el inicio de sesión por correo electrónico</2>.
Want a link to share directly with your: ¿Quieres un enlace para compartir directamente con tu equipo?

Check the network requests and server lo: Compruebe las peticiones de red y los registros del servidor para obtener todos los detalles del error.
Your custom domain is successfully point: Your custom domain is successfully pointing at Outline. To complete the setup process please contact support.
A magic sign-in link has been sent to th: A magic sign-in link has been sent to the email {{ emailLinkSentTo }} if an account exists.
Get started by choosing a sign-in method: Get started by choosing a sign-in method for your new workspace below…
You signed in with {{ authProviderName }: Iniciaste sesión con {{ authProviderName }} la última vez.
Already have an account? Go to <1>login<: ¿Ya tienes una cuenta? Ve a <1>iniciar sesión</1>.

Author: Autor
We were unable to find the page you’re l: No pudimos encontrar la página que buscabas.
No documents found for your search filte: No se encontraron documentos para sus filtros de búsqueda.
The domains which should be allowed to c: The domains which should be allowed to create new accounts using SSO. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
Your import is being processed, you can: Su importación está siendo procesada, puede abandonar esta página de manera segura
File not supported – please upload a val: Archivo no soportado - por favor sube un archivo ZIP válido
Drag and drop the zip file from Notion's: Arrastra y suelta el archivo zip desde la opción de exportación HTML de Notion, o haz clic para subir
In Notion, click <em>Settings & Members<: In Notion, click Settings & Members in the left sidebar and open Settings. Look for the Export section, and click Export all workspace content. Choose HTML as the format for the best data compatability.
Drag and drop the zip file from the Mark: Drag and drop the zip file from the Markdown export option in {{appName}}, or click to upload
You can import a zip file that was previ: You can import a zip file that was previously exported from an Outline installation – collections, documents, and images will be imported. In Outline, open Export in the Settings sidebar and click on Export Data.
These events should be posted to Slack: Estos eventos deben publicarse en Slack
Are you sure you want to revoke the {{ t: ¿Está seguro que quieres revocar la clave {{ tokenName }}?
Are you sure you want to delete the {{ n: ¿Estás seguro que quieres eliminar el webhook {{ name }}?
Provide a descriptive name for this webh: Provide a descriptive name for this webhook and the URL we should send a POST request to when matching events are created.
Subscribe to all events, groups, or indi: Subscribe to all events, groups, or individual events. We recommend only subscribing to the minimum amount of events that your application needs to function.
Unable to upload new logo: No se puede subir el nuevo logo
These settings affect the way that your: These settings affect the way that your knowledge base appears to everyone on the team.
The logo is displayed at the top left of: The logo is displayed at the top left of the application.
The workspace name, usually the same as: The workspace name, usually the same as your company name.
Your knowledge base will be accessible a: Se podrá acceder a su base de conocimientos en
Choose a subdomain to enable a login pag: Choose a subdomain to enable a login page just for your team.
This is the screen that workspace member: This is the screen that workspace members will first see when they sign in.
A full export might take some time, cons: A full export might take some time, consider exporting a single document or collection. The exported data is a zip of your documents in Markdown format. You may leave this page once the export has started – if you have notifications enabled, we will email a link to {{ userEmail }} when it’s complete.
Manage optional and beta features. Chang: Manage optional and beta features. Changing these settings will affect the experience for all members of the workspace.
When enabled documents are always editab: When enabled documents are always editable for team members that have permission. When disabled there is a separate editing view.
Show your team’s logo on public pages li: Show your team’s logo on public pages like login and shared documents.
Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID: Add a Google Analytics 4 measurement ID to send document views and analytics from the workspace to your own Google Analytics account.
Create a \"Web\" stream in your Google A: Create a "Web" stream in your Google Analytics admin dashboard and copy the measurement ID from the generated code snippet to install.
Groups can be used to organize and manag: Los grupos se pueden usar para organizar y administrar a las personas de tu equipo.
No groups have been created yet: Aún no se ha creado ningún grupo
Quickly transfer your existing documents: Quickly transfer your existing documents, pages, and files from other tools and services into {{appName}}. You can also drag and drop any HTML, Markdown, and text documents directly into Collections in the app.
Import a zip file of Markdown documents: Import a zip file of Markdown documents (exported from version 0.67.0 or earlier)
Import pages from a Confluence instance: Import pages from a Confluence instance
Everyone that has signed into {{appName}: Everyone that has signed into {{appName}} is listed here. It’s possible that there are other users who have access through {team.signinMethods} but haven’t signed in yet.
Receive a notification whenever a new do: Recibir notificaciones por correo cuando se publique un nuevo documento
Receive a notification when a document y: Recibir notificaciones por correo cuando se edite un documento creado por ti
Receive a notification whenever a new co: Recibir notificaciones por correo cuando se cree una nueva colección
Receive a notification when someone you: Receive a notification when someone you invited creates an account
Receive a notification when an export yo: Receive a notification when an export you requested has been completed
Receive an email when new features of no: Recibir un correo cuando se agreguen nuevas funcionalidades destacadas
Unsubscription successful. Your notifica: Cancelación de suscripción exitosa. Se ha actualizado la configuración de tus notificaciones
Manage when and where you receive email: Manage when and where you receive email notifications.
Your email address should be updated in: Your email address should be updated in your SSO provider.
The email integration is currently disab: La integración de correo electrónico está actualmente deshabilitada. Configura las variables de entorno asociadas y reinicia el servidor para habilitar las notificaciones.
Manage settings that affect your persona: Manage settings that affect your personal experience.
Choose the interface language. Community: Choose the interface language. Community translations are accepted though our <2>translation portal</2>.
Show a hand cursor when hovering over in: Show a hand cursor when hovering over interactive elements.
Show line numbers on code blocks in docu: Show line numbers on code blocks in documents.
Automatically return to the document you: Automatically return to the document you were last viewing when the app is re-opened.
You may delete your account at any time,: Puede eliminar su cuenta en cualquier momento, tenga en cuenta que esto es irréversible
Unable to upload new profile picture: No se puede subir una nueva foto de perfil
Manage how you appear to other members o: Manage how you appear to other members of the workspace.
Choose a photo or image to represent you: Choose a photo or image to represent yourself.
This could be your real name, or a nickn: This could be your real name, or a nickname — however you’d like people to refer to you.
Are you sure you want to require invites: Are you sure you want to require invites?
New users will first need to be invited: New users will first need to be invited to create an account. Default role and Allowed domains will no longer apply.
Settings that impact the access, securit: Configuraciones que afectan el acceso, la seguridad y el contenido de tu base de conocimiento.
Allow members to sign-in with {{ authPro: Allow members to sign-in with {{ authProvider }}
Allow members to sign-in using their ema: Allow members to sign-in using their email address
The server must have SMTP configured to: El servidor debe tener SMTP configurado para habilitar esta opción
Require members to be invited to the wor: Require members to be invited to the workspace before they can create an account using SSO.
The default user role for new accounts. Changing this setting does not affect existing user accounts.
When enabled, documents can be shared pu: When enabled, documents can be shared publicly on the internet by any member of the workspace
When enabled, viewers can see download o: When enabled, viewers can see download options for documents
Links to supported services are shown as: Los enlaces a los servicios soportados se muestran como incrustaciones enriquecidas dentro de tus documentos
Allow members to create new collections: Allow members to create new collections within the knowledge base
Add your self-hosted draw.io installatio: Add your self-hosted draw.io installation url here to enable automatic embedding of diagrams within documents.
You can globally enable and disable publ: Puedes activar y descavtivat globalmente el uso de documentos compartidos públicamente en la configuración de seguridad.
Documents that have been shared are list: Los documentos que se han compartido se enumeran a continuación. Cualquiera que tenga el enlace público puede acceder a una versión de solo lectura del documento hasta que se revoque el enlace.
Whoops, you need to accept the permissio: Whoops, you need to accept the permissions in Slack to connect{{appName}} to your team. Try again?
Something went wrong while authenticatin: Se ha producido un error al autenticar tu solicitud. Intenta iniciar sesión de nuevo.
Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links: Get rich previews of {{ appName }} links shared in Slack and use the {{ command }} slash command to search for documents without leaving your chat.
Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack: Connect {{appName}} collections to Slack channels. Messages will be automatically posted to Slack when documents are published or updated.
The Slack integration is currently disab: La integración de Slack está actualmente desactivada. Configura las variables de entorno asociadas y reinicia el servidor para habilitar la integración.
You can create an unlimited amount of pe: Puedes crear una cantidad ilimitada de tokens personales para autenticar con la API. Los tokens tienen los mismos permisos que tu cuenta de usuario. Para obtener más detalles, consulta la documentación para desarrolladores.
Webhooks can be used to notify your appl: Webhooks can be used to notify your application when events happen in {{appName}}. Events are sent as a https request with a JSON payload in near real-time.
Zapier is a platform that allows {{appNa: Zapier is a platform that allows {{appName}} to easily integrate with thousands of other business tools. Automate your workflows, sync data, and more.
Your are creating a new workspace using: Your are creating a new workspace using your current account — {{email}}
When your new workspace is created, you: When your new workspace is created, you will be the admin, meaning you will have the highest level of permissions and the ability to invite others.
You can create templates to help your te: Puedes crear plantillas para ayudar a tu equipo a crear documentación coherente y precisa.
La papelera está vacía en este momento.
A confirmation code has been sent to you: A confirmation code has been sent to your email address, please enter the code below to permanantly destroy your account.
<em>Note:</em> Signing back in will caus: Nota: Al volver a iniciar sesión se reaprovisionará automáticamente una nueva cuenta.
Are you sure? Deleting your account will: Are you sure? Deleting your account will destroy identifying data associated with your user and cannot be undone. You will be immediately logged out of {{appName}} and all your API tokens will be revoked.
{{ userName }} hasn’t updated any docume: {{ userName }} aún no ha actualizado ningún documento.
To search your knowledgebase use {{ comm:
To search your knowledgebase use {{ command }}. 
You’ve already learned how to get help with {{ command2 }}.
Sorry, we couldn’t find an integration f: Sorry, we couldn’t find an integration for your team. Head to your {{ appName }} settings to set one up.
It looks like you haven’t signed in to {: It looks like you haven’t signed in to {{ appName }} yet, so results may be limited
